thread.title: Was in for NY fashion week
thread.title_full: Was in for NY fashion week - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: davidsO450IC
title: Was in for NY fashion week
text: It was mine and my hubby's 11th wedding anniversary and I modeled for NY fashion week first visit to NY and found the hotel and stay to be wonderful . Loved the location and gym . Only thing I could recommend is some shades that can be pulled to darken room other than that 100%
